nodes.text: Transport 22 was the designation for a StarSpeeder 3000 craft owned by the Star Tours travel agency. C-3PO and R2-D2 performed maintenance and repairs on this vessel while working at the travel agency months after the Battle of Endor.

A disaster nearly occurred when C-3PO, while distracted with a debate with R2-D2 regarding droid rights, failed to check the fuel pressure and shut off the main line until R2-D2 warned him at the last minute. In addition, a few times the laser cannons nearly discharged, with R2-D2 often narrowly shutting them off.
